    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddProductController
    Controller class for managing product addition functionality.
    AddProductFacade
    Facade class for managing product addition.
    CartFacade
    Facade class for managing shopping cart operations.
    CatalogController
    Controller class for managing product catalog-related functionality.
    CatalogFacade
    Facade class for managing catalog-related operations.
    DaApplication
     
    InventoryService
    Service class for managing product inventory.
    LoadProductDatabase
    Configuration class responsible for loading initial product data into the in-memory H2 database when the application starts.
    PriceCalculationService
    Service class for handling price calculations.
    Product
    Entity class representing a Product in the e-commerce system.
    ProductController
    Controller class for managing product-related REST API endpoints.
    ProductDetailController
    Controller class for managing product details.
    ProductDetailDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing detailed product information.
    ProductDetailFacade
    Facade class for managing detailed product information.
    ProductRepository
    Repository interface for managing Product entities.
    ProductService
    Service class for managing product-related operations.
    ShoppingCart
    Represents a shopping cart containing products and their quantities.
    ShoppingCartController
    Controller class for managing the shopping cart.
    ShoppingCartService
    Service class for managing shopping cart operations.
    User
    Represents a user in the e-commerce system.
    UserController
    REST controller class for managing users.
    UserService
    Service class for managing user-related operations.
